summary: Donald Trump claims that it is time for action on the issue of healthcare, specifically regarding Obamacare. He argues that senators who vote against starting the debate are supporting the "Obamacare nightmare" and are not fulfilling their promise to repeal and replace it. Trump believes that this is an opportunity for Democrats to make up for the harm caused by Obamacare and for Senate Republicans to keep their promise to provide relief and improve healthcare for all Americans. This statement was made on July 24th, 2017 during a debate on Trump Healthcare.
